name: CaveRunner
description:
This Game is a short Cave Platformer with spiders and bats. Try beating this Game as fast as possible with the Speedrun Timer and collect all 40 Gems as an extra challenge!

This Game was made as an entry for Miz Jam 1 with "Kenney's 1-Bit Pack" art kit.

I hope you like this short game :3

Controls: W, A, S, D

Press A or D to move left or right.

Press W to jump (hold for higher jump).

Press S while on ground to slide.

Press S while mid-air to accelerate downwards.
